pageContext.claim: “[McCain] handed something to the FBI on me. He knew [the dossier] was a fake. He handed it to the FBI. That's an issue.”
pageContext.analysis: McCain did turn over the dossier to the FBI, but he had no idea if it contained false or real information. Former McCain aide David Kramer, a Russia expert, has testified that he gave the dossier to the media in December 2016.
